import { CTable, CTableBody, CTableDataCell, CTableHead, CTableHeaderCell, CTableRow } from '@coreui/react' import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function ReportedIncidents() { const reports = [ { id:1, title : 'Errorrr', severity: 'High', Date : '22-10-2023', status : 'Processing' }, { id:2, title : 'Errorrr', severity: 'High', Date : '22-10-2023', status : 'Processing' }, { id:3, title : 'Errorrr', severity: 'High', Date : '22-10-2023', status : 'Processing' }, { id:4, title : 'Errorrr', severity: 'High', Date : '22-10-2023', status : 'Processing' }, ] let i =1; const viewOne = () => { window.location.href='/admin/single' } return (
  • Admin Dashboard
  • Reported Incidents
  • Logout
Reported Incidents
S/n Title Severity Date Status Action {reports.map(({id,title,severity,Date,status}) => { return ( {i++} {title} {severity} {Date} {status} viewOne(id)}> ) })}
) } export default ReportedIncidents
